info.title: HSE REST API
info.description: API description for the HSE REST server.

/events/{file}.description: Interact with event counter information for file.

get.description: Get all event counter information for file.

/events/{file}/{function}.description: Interact with event counter information for function in file.

get.description: Get all event counter information for function in file.

/events/{file}/{function}/{lineno}.description: Interact with event counter information for function on line number of file.

get.description: Get all event counter information for function on line number of file.

/params/{param}.description: Interact with a specific global parameter.

get.description: Get the value of the global parameter.

put.description: Set the value of the global parameter.

/perfc/{group}.description: Interact with performance counter information for group.

get.description: Get all performance counter information for group.

200.description: Successfully retrieved event counter information for group.

/perfc/{group}/{set}.description: Interact with performance counter information for group in set.

get.description: Get all performance counter information for group in set.

200.description: Successfully retrieved event counter information for group in set.

/perfc/{group}/{set}/{counterName}.description: Interact with performance counter information for group in set with name.

get.description: Get all performance counter information for group in set with name.

200.description: Successfully retrieved event counter information for group in set with name.

get.description: Get the current KVDB compaction status.

/kvdbs/{alias}/csched.description: Interact with the KVDB compaction scheduler.

get.description: Get information about all current KVDB compaction jobs.

schema.description: All current compaction jobs running within this KVDB.

/kvdbs/{alias}/home.description: Get the home directory for a KVDB.

/kvdbs/{alias}/params/{param}.description: Interact with a specific KVDB parameter.

get.description: Get the value of the KVDB parameter.

put.description: Set the value of the KVDB parameter.

get.description: Get list of configured media classes and their paths.
Get information about a media class.

/kvdbs/{alias}/kvs.description: Get the list of KVS owned by this KVDB.

/kvdbs/{alias}/kvs/{kvsName}/cn/tree.description: Interact with the KVS's cN tree.

get.description: Get information about the KVS's cN tree.

/kvdbs/{alias}/kvs/{kvsName}/params/{par.description: Interact with a specific KVS parameter.

get.description: Get the value of the KVS parameter.

put.description: Set the value of the KVS parameter.

tags.name: global
tags.description: Related to global information about the storage engine.

paramValue.description: Value to set a parameter to.
